Reviews.Title: Great item !!!
Reviews.Author: Mike S
Reviews.Content: Has all the right items as advertised. Arrived right on time. Now I'm in the process of learning all the neat things the camera can do.Pictures are out standing. The Canon camera was recommended by a professional photographer and a couple of friends.

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed
ISO 100 - 6400 for shooting from bright to dim light
Vari-angle 3.0-inch Clear View LCD monitor (3:2) for shooting at high or low angles and 1,040,000-dot VGA with reflection reduction
Video Snapshot features for enhanced video shooting options
Comes with camera body, EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Type II lens, eyecup, wide strap, USB cable, AV cable, battery, and charger
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital Camera SLR Kit With Canon EF-S 18-55mm IS II + Canon 75-300mm III Lens + Large Camera and Lens Case + 16 GB Card + Card Reader + Extra Battery Pack + 2 58mm UV Filters + Memory Card Wallet + Cleaning Kit
